column5: Anyone know of a Lowe dealership in and around toronto.....plus or minus 45 min drive time??  Thanks,  Meely
Try Pisces Marine.  They're in Oakville off Third Line.
Leatherdale in Orillia!  Have had good service experience there.  TB Coffee's on me !
I think the marina on hwy#7 close to #27
PM Pikehunter he bought his Lowe new.
You have a PM Meely. Have fun on your quest for a boat.
I know it's not within 45 min., but Bridgenorth Sports & Marine is a Lowe dealer as well: 705-292-9751
